phrases: It is not that you did not know how to deal with things.
It is just that no one showed you how to.
Besides, I do not like your taste in music.
Oh well, this key can open it anytime.
Could it be the wavelength of the Great Devil?
It seems like we have a winner for the second battle.
Both souls' responses have eased up.
She seems to have matched the Devil Sword's wavelength well.
The Devil Sword's wavelength is stabilizing, too.
This is the first time I cried this much.
I do not know how to deal with the tears...
But we cannot leave her like this.
Why you, what did you do?!
Why is my master like this?!
Is it funny to become friends with these guys?
No matter what you do, it is still boring!
It is a great way to relieve stress, is not it?
I will not let you off!
I will not let you have her!
Chrona, how dare you hit me!
Do you know how I feel, being hit by you?
It is like a poo which could not come out for three days,
I would not understand such a vulgar example!
Anyway, we entrust him to you!
The Trap Prepared By The Immortal Man?
I wonder if everyone caught up with the ones carrying the black blood.
A black crust stopped the bleeding.
I think it healed by itself when the black blood disappeared from me.
But why did the black blood inside you disappear?
Anyway, if a Kishin gets the black blood...
We have to catch up with Kid-kun and Black Star.
Damn, I am missing out on my big entrance!
And it is dark so I cannot stand out!
Your loud voice already stands out!
We have to get to Kid!
It is fine as long as you do not look.
I can feel a Kishin's wavelength.
I have never felt this much pressure before.
The Kishin is inside there, right?
I heard this from father, so I do not know much about the details.
To defeat Asura, he removed his skin... and sealed him with it.
To defeat Asura, he removed his skin... and sealed him with it.
To defeat Asura, he removed his skin... and sealed him with it.
Your father in the past was pretty scary...
To create a sack to seal Asura.
To carry Asura's soul, body... and madness.
To carry Asura's soul, body... and madness.
To carry Asura's soul, body... and madness.
His own face was the most suitable to seal him with.
Father took all of Asura's blood,
That is why they are giving him the black blood?
I was so occupied with the Kishin's madness that I did not notice him.
Trying to do this fair and square is useless...
I will have to break his balance and take him out in that opening.
When it comes to mobility I am better than him...
If I breach him even once, he will not be able to keep up.
I will not let you pass!
As I thought, he is targeting my speed this way!
Death Cannon did not slow him down?!
At this range, this is bad!
At this range, this is bad!
He will not come at me recklessly.
If he gets close for an attack,
That pillar and this pillar were once a single pillar!
It is not that I was thinking about that...
Well, it was actually bothering me though...
If it is doing puzzles, I will join you.
Dammit, where is the arm that fell from that statue?
That elephant, the trunk is missing.
It is no use... no... stop...
It is no use... no... stop...
It is no use... no... stop...
That pillar, could it fit that way?
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
Pillar, elephant, trunk, left, below, above, right, nose...
This is bad, even though he is inside a place like this, he was doing a great job.
At this rate, he will lose his mind and end up being driven by madness.
He started scratching his head, he is started thinking!
We have to fix the atmosphere!
It is our... no, it is my victory!
It is a pity but there will be no Kishin resurrection!
Idiot, the one who has the black blood is further ahead!
Then what are you doing in a place like this?
This way we can get Kid's attention on the Werewolf.
That guy is only wearing that ball on his left foot.
I do not forgive anyone who stands in my way!
The problem is this other kid...
What is wrong with this Kid?
It is weird, this physical unease...
He did not try to avoid my attacks.
Why is he frantically avoiding Black Star if he is immortal?
I see, I get it now.
I will tear you into pieces!
If you can do it, go ahead and try.
The you that stands before me cannot do it, right?
Seems this is as far as it gets...
Devil Eye... this is your magic?
It is a magic that projects a live feed of my body.
Making a mess on my tadpole's head...
If I did not do this we would not move ahead.
How did you figure it out?
You did not try to evade my shots...
But you did not want to be hit by Black Star's attacks.
If you would really be hit, we would find out that it is not a real body, right?
The first attack was shot from behind the image right?
That was to make us believe the image was real.
Besides, since I was afraid of your immortal body, I stuck to long ranged attacks.
It is a good trick to be used by an immortal.
Why did not you notice when you cut him?
When I cut him with the knife, I was thinking what a great technique!
I was thinking Black Star has grown up, and stuff...
If the Technician is an idiot, the Weapon is one, too?
We have wasted a lot of time!
They completed every task you gave them properly.
You can feel it too, right?
It wants to blow out... the Kishin's madness.
Even if you struggle, it is useless.
How to raise a good child...
The Kishin is inside there, right?
Let us hurry or those kids will catch up.
An immortal like me is going to die?
What the hell was I doing?
